title: how do i post a picture?
body: I cant see any add attachment or add picture or any button like that... wtf?

replies.body: Can you describe the actual issue you're having with League? I'd love to help you out, but I'll need some background information. A screenshot may or may not be necessary, but context on the situation is. Thank you.

You have to link it from an online source. If it's on your computer, you'll need to upload it somewhere first, such as an image hosting site like Imgur or Gyazo. Then just right click the image and copy image URL/address and paste that here.

They used to allow uploading images directly to your post, but it was removed for security issues.
